system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.
system.descriptionText: The Tank Ace lives and breaths within the vehicles they aid in the operation of. Through their commands even the slowest of vehicles can find finesse, and even the fastest cannot escape their sightlines.
system.effects:
Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Tank Ace. Apt: Agility, Fellowship, Leadership, Perception, Tech, Willpower 
Add. Equipment: Auspex/Scanner, Combi-Tool, Data-Slate, Good Laspistol. Gain Talents: Lightning Reflexes+Technical Knock or Push the Limit
Can Purchase Unique Talent: Crack Manoeuvring and Basic Order: Line Up the Shot
